src_original: pradhānaṃ śiṣyam ekaṃ tu kṛtvā brūyād idaṃ vacaḥ // 191
ehi vatsa mahāyānaṃ mantracaryānayaṃ vidhim /  deśayiṣyāmi te samyak bhājanas tvaṃ mahānaye // 192
mantraprayogam atulaṃ yena bhagnaṃ mahābalam /  mārasainyaṃ mahāghoraṃ sākyasiṃhādibhir varaiḥ // 194
pratibimbasamā dharmā acchāḥ śuddhā hy anāvilāḥ /
tathatātattvaniryātā iti satyena maṇḍale /  pratibimbaṃ sphuṭaṃ śiṣyāḥ sarve paśyantv akalmaṣāḥ // 289  sāmānyasaṃvaraṃ śiṣyaṃ prāgvat kāyādibhāsvaraṃ /
raktāmbaraṃ tadāsyaṃ ca pṛcchet kas tvam iti priya /
śiṣyeṇāpi tato vācyaṃ subhago 'ham iti priya // 291  saṃpūjya srakkaraṃ dvāri tathaivādattadakṣiṇam /  yogacittaṃ samutpādya hṛdi vajraṃ hṛdā nyaset // 292  mantraḥ //
